definition: Zhao Shuli (1906-1970), proletarian novelist
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms

sentences.english: I translated three of Chao's books.
sentences.chinese: 我翻譯了趙樹理的三本書。

sentences.english: Zhao Shuli s novels embodies elegance from its popularization.
sentences.chinese: 趙樹理小說在通俗化中呈現出了高雅的氛圍。

sentences.english: Frankly, I was disappointed in Chao's books.
sentences.chinese: 說實話，我對趙樹理的書感到失望。

sentences.english: All of the evaluation on Zhao Shuli's works should base on this point.
sentences.chinese: 這是評價趙樹理文學作品的一個基點。

sentences.english: Chao always had more white beans than black.
sentences.chinese: 趙樹理的白豆總是比黑豆多。
